name: Zombie with a long arm!
description:
Its hard to control a long arm right?

Move with W-D and Jump with W  -- Muévete con W-D y salta con W

Control your arm with The mouse. - Controla tu brazo con el mouse

Right Click to pick a gun o leave a gun, Left Click to shot AND START THE MASACREEEE  - Click derecho para recoger un arma o dejarla, click izquierdo para disparar y QUE EMPIEZE LA MASACREEE
